filter_description: Text displayed at settings box. User can check/uncheck filters, and this notice is to inform users that the filters only applies to new events and not to the existing ones.
settings_tool:
The noun used to refer to this (the Raun program itself).
{{Identical|Tool}}
tool_language: Text displayed as form label to select the tool's language
tool_wikis: Text displayed as form label to select the wikis for the tool to display
language:
Project's language which is currently used at the tool.
{{Identical|Language}}
project:
Project which is currently used at the tool.
{{Identical|Project}}
hide_settings: Label at the button to hide the settings panel.
show_settings: Label at the button to show the settings panel.
settings_editor_edits: Edits made by users with Editor rights
settings_admin_edits: Edits made by users with Administrator or Sysop rights
settings_other_edits: Other edits not in above filters
settings_more_entries: At Settings > Tool. If option is checked, tool will not automatically show new entries
def_def: If possible, please put three synonyms of "patrol" separated by semicolon.
about_github:
Availability of source code. Parameters:
* $1 - a link pointing to [http://github.com/kenrick95/Raun github.com/kenrick95/Raun]
